articles.title: Ford says Trump tariffs to cost it $2bn this year - BBC
articles.description: It is the latest indication of the impact of US President Donald Trump's tariffs on big American firms.
articles.content:
Motor industry giant Ford says it expects tariffs to cost it about $2bn (£1.5bn) this year, which is more than previously expected, despite building most of its cars in America.
The company says it … [+1525 chars]

articles.author: Jack Dunn
articles.title: White House Slams Liberal Outrage Over Sydney Sweeney Jeans Commercial - Variety
articles.description: The White House says the Left's 'moronic' reaction to Sydney Sweeney's American Eagle jeans commercial is a 'big reason' Americans voted for Trump.
articles.content:
The White House is weighing in on the controversial American Eagle jeans advertisement featuring Sydney Sweeney.
